H0.text: Bottling water is the method used to recycle water for humans to use, given that Earth has a limited supply of fresh drinking water.

H1.text: Dam construction is the method used to recycle water for humans to use, addressing Earthâ€™s limited supply of fresh drinking water.

H2.text: Collecting rainwater is the method used to recycle water for humans to use, given that Earth has a limited supply of fresh drinking water.

H3.text: Wastewater treatment is the method used to recycle water for humans to use on Earth, where the supply of fresh drinking water is limited.

A4.text: Treated wastewater can be reused as reclaimed water.

A5.text: The main purpose of wastewater treatment is for the treated wastewater to be able to be disposed or reused safely.
